evidence.claim: ForWARD Health implements secure API endpoints for healthcare data exchange, ensuring compliance with HIPAA regulations.
The company utilizes AWS cloud services for storing and processing healthcare-related data.
ForWARD Health is focused on utilizing FHIR standards for interoperability within health systems.
Integration with various EHRs follows HL7 standards to facilitate data interchange.
The company enables X12 EDI transactions for billing and claims processing in healthcare.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of handling X12 transactions or claims processing in their services.
